experience.company: ARMAN JV LLP, Member of Shell and Lukoil- Kazakhstan
experience.description:
Ensures proper and safe operation, timely maintenance and repair of the equipment assigned to the Chief Mechanic. Ensures compliance of the technical condition of the equipment, mechanisms and tools with the operations regulations.                                                                 • Chief Mechanic shall organize development and feasibility evaluation of draft long-range and annual plans on preventive maintenance to ensure a non-interrupted operation of the equipment; shall evaluate the results of implementation of these plans.                                     • Analyzes reasons of its breakdown; develops measures to enhance efficiency of its use and to increase the equipment run time between repairs.                                                                                                                                               • Analyzes and as required compiles PO’s on equipment, basic materials, tools and spare parts for field repair needs, controls timeliness of their raising.                                                   • Works out annual and quarterly work plans, validates work scope of the chief mechanic sector, need in staff, and allocates work responsibilities between workers. Compiles and provides technical and financial reports dealing with reporting technical facilities and equipment.
• Conducts work on development and signing contracts, as well as interacts with contractors concerning maintenance, repair, installation of process equipment and units in the field.               •   Performs all functions of a budget holder and a contract holder, carries out benchmarking.
Achievements: 
• Lead of Project of Utilization of Natural Gas. Installation of Gas Booster Compressors Unit” (Ariel), Direct Heaters, new injection pumps, Water injection pipelines (Fiberglass). Cost is 3 million $.                                                                                                                         
• Responsible of Upgrade pumping facility and Solar Gas/Diesel Turbine in field .Cost is 1.5 million $.

• Service and Technical support for clients of CSSI Company; 
• Engineering consult, support and refurbishment different types of Mechanical seals.
• Develop technical proposal for all Product by John Crane for Customers in Kazakhstan.
• To organize Training by JC for Customers in KZ. 
Achievements: 
• Understanding of the required work involved in Mechanical seal selection, troubleshooting problems and different Customers in Kazakhstan.                                                                             • Extend relation and reputation by JC in Kazakhstan.

Managing the team of  120-150 technicians, foremen’s and engineers for the construction phase and job was included start up and commissioning of rotating equipment like pumps & Gas Injection compressors, Booster compressor and equipment facilities.                                        • Includes reviewing all projects plans and assessing / planning work, coordinating the smooth startup of projects, supervising construction work in progress, signing off completion certificates, collecting all final documentation from contractors and representing the Company as the day-to-day interface with contractors during all phases of the construction or installation work on-site. Monitored progress of construction activities and provide daily progress report identifying problems and critical issues.                                                             • Ensured that testing & commissioning of PRVT’s (production reliability verification test) are done as per Company standard and prepares Spare parts list of equipment.                         • Responsible for the support of Company safety, environment and quality policies and programs.                                                                                                                Achievements:                                                                                                                             • Gain international experience during construction & commissioning phase of Sour Gas Injection project and Gas Injection Compressors by Nuovo Pignone (560Bar).                                                                                                                                                   • Commissioning for Vessels, Tanks, Pipe racks, Boilers and HVAC equipment for buildings and other facilities. Preparation of documentation, as build Dwg’s for handover to Operation.

experience.position: Data Base Development Engineer for CMMS.  Data Collection Group
experience.description: Working as Mechanical Engineer in development of asset register, inventories, PMs and Job Plans; Checking of project drawings, documents and database;                                                                    • Entering of process mechanical equipment and piping systems data into Mechanical Spreadsheet from as built documentations;                                                                                  • Checking of Red line marked up as built documentations and turnover documentations.         • P&IDs and PFDs searching for asset data population.                                                                              • Familiarization with ANSI, ISA & KPO Guidelines                                                    Achievements:                                                                                                                            • Preparation of data base, Implementation and finalization of MAXIMO CMMS for Karachaganak Gas processing complex.                                                                                                                             • Accumulate experience and knowledge in CMMS.(MAXIMO)

Ensuring all mechanical activities and tasks within the commissioning group are planned to comply with the overall commissioning schedule. To following equipment: process and utilities mechanical equipment (vessels, different valves, gas & oil pipelines, heat exchangers, any types  pumps and compressors, blower units, Generators1MW, Boilers, funs and HVAC equipment and other facilities) in KPC.                                                                                                                             • Ensure active participation in work permit and JSA activities to ensure a safe work environment for all employees during commissioning tasks.                                                               • Ensure that works are set out and controlled in accordance with the approved design and specifications.                                                                                                                               • Managing team of 80-100 employees during daily field commissioning activities and assist all vendor representatives during the commissioning phase..                                                                             • Assist commissioning data base system administrators' to ensure commissioning documentation is entered into the system.                                                                          Achievements:                                                                                                                                      • Lead of Mechanical Team during Commissioning & Start Up and strong responsibility.                                                                                                                                           • To finalized Commissioning and preparation of all Documentation to Handover to Operation.

•	Выполнял рабочие обязанности согласно штатной должности В подчинении были служащие-2, мастера- 3 слесаря, сварщики, монтажники-25, бригадир -2 общее кол-ве 30 чел    резервуарный парк,  перекачивающая насосная станция, крановый участок, транспортёры, сосуды для хранения жидкого аммиака. трубопровод аммиака, фосфорных кислот, пара, газа).
     1993-1998 году был переведён на должность механика отделения цеха на  Химкомплексе.
•	Выполнял обязанности ИТР по обслуживанию и ремонту оборудования ( резервуарный парк,  перекачивающая насосная, крановый участок, транспортёры, сосуды под хранения жидкого аммиака)
     1992-1993 г. после службы в армии был принят в Прикаспийского Горно-Металлургического    Комбината на  Химико Горно Металлургический Завод слесарем по ремонту оборудования 5 разряда, гидрометаллургического цеха. 
•	Через год был переведён мастером-механиком на  ХГМЗ. В подчинении находились слесаря 10 чел и бригадиры 2 чел
